snippet.title: Void's Ballad - Announce Trailer (ENG)
snippet.description:
Void’s Ballad is a dark investigative adventure though the biggest human fear: Death.
You play as Phoebe, a joyful girl who has been shocked by the car accident that involved Joey, her boyfriend. She found out a mysterious note that made her realize that he might have planned that accident for months.
You have to explore the house, find clues and discover more about Joey and Phoebe’s past, pass through seven days to save a life and gather information all around you.
Will you save Joey?

Void's Ballad is going to be released on 3rd September 2021 on Nintendo Switch and Steam

Visit our sites!
Website: http://namelesstudio.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/namelessstudioofficial
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/namelesstudio/

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/namelessstudio

#VoidsBallad
